title: Coffee Plus™ 12-Cup Programmable Coffeemaker with Hot Water System Commercial
description: Fresh, delicious coffee is only the beginning! This incredible hot beverage machine comes complete with all your favorite features, like 24-hour programmability, carafe temperature control, Brew Pause™, and the ultra-convenient Hot Water System. Now, you're never more than a minute away from enjoying your favorite instant soup, hot cocoa, tea and more.

asset.author: CuisinartVideo
asset.hookText:
Fresh, delicious coffee is only the beginning! This incredible hot beverage machine comes complete withall your favorite features, like 24-hour programmability, carafe temperature control, Brew Pause™, and the ultra-convenient Hot Water System. Now, you're never more than a minute away from enjoying your favorite instant soup, hot cocoa, tea and more.

Learn More: http://www.cuisinart.com/products/coffee_bar/chw-12.html#top

transcripts:
[MUSIC PLAYING] 
Is your coffee maker equipped to please a crowd? Can it satisfy different tastes at the same time? Is it missing that extra plus? The fully automatic Cuisinart coffee plus has two separate heating systems with two generous reservoirs to brew 12 cups of fresh hot coffee plus a 56 ounce hot water system to dispense more beverages at the same time or on its own so you can keep the hot beverages flowing and the day going. It's not just a coffee maker it's definitely a plus Cuisinart coffee plus.
